COMMAND.NAME: gotomark
COMMAND.PARAMETER: bufferName The unique name of an e93 buffer.
COMMAND.DESCRIPTION: Set the selection in bufferName to the one marked by markName.
COMMAND.STATUS: If either the mark, or buffer specified does not exist, and error is returned.

This command will return an error in the following cases:
bufferName is not provided.
bufferName is not an e93 buffer.
